name: whisper-transcriber
description: セラピスト向け完全無料音声文字起こしツール

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:backend: echo 'Deploy backend via Render dashboard or git push'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.setup:render: echo 'Create Render account and connect GitHub repo'
scripts.setup:supabase: echo 'Create Supabase project and run migrations'

author: 小林龍樹
